Table: orders

OrderID: A unique identifier for each order.
OrderDate: The date the order was placed.
CustomerID: A unique identifier for each customer, linking orders to their respective customers.
CustomerName: The name of the customer placing the order.
TableNumber: The number of the table where the order was placed (for dine-in services).
ServerID: A unique identifier for the server handling the order.
MenuItemID: A unique identifier for each menu item ordered.
MenuItemName: The name of the menu item ordered.
Category: The category of the menu item (e.g., Appetizers, Main Course).
SubCategory: A further classification of the menu item (e.g., Vegetarian, Gluten-Free).
Quantity: The number of items ordered.
Sales: The total sales amount for that order.
Discount: Any discount applied to the order.
Profit: The profit generated from that order.
OrderStatus: The current status of the order (e.g., Completed, In Progress, Canceled).
PaymentStatus: The status of the payment (e.g., Paid, Pending, Refunded).
DeliveryMethod: The method of service, such as dine-in, takeout, or delivery.
OrderPriority: The priority level of the order (e.g., High, Medium, Low).
